security: This file contains performance reviews and internal agency communications praising Mr. Wheeler's service. Disclosing specifics from personnel files could reveal insights into the agency's methods of evaluating and rewarding staff. The document is marked SECRET.
summary: This document is Robert P. Wheeler's official personnel file, containing records of his retirement, commendations, and career achievements within the CIA.
summary_one_paragraph: Robert P. Wheeler's personnel file documents his CIA career, including his voluntary retirement effective December 31, 1973, and subsequent recognition. The file contains forms detailing his assignments, salary, and retirement data, as well as letters from Director Colby and F. W. M. Janney, Director of Personnel, congratulating him on his service. Additionally, it includes notification of the Distinguished Intelligence Medal award, citing his outstanding achievements, integrity, leadership, and contributions from September 1952 to December 1973, in various senior positions both at headquarters and abroad.
title: Official Personnel Folder of Robert P. Wheeler
sender: F. W. M. Janney, W. E. Colby, R. L. Austin, Jr.
